From The New York Times : WASHINGTON — [ARG1: President Trump ’s personal lawyer , Rudolph W. Giuliani , abruptly resigned from his law firm , Greenberg Traurig] , [ARG0: the firm] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] , [ARGM-TMP: then] ...
